title: USB dongle not supporting and showing "charging"
content:
I have been using my pixel 2 xl for 6 months. Today I tried to play music via usb c to audio jack dongle (original and supplied in the pixel 2 xl box) but music
started playing from the speakers. Yesterday it was working fine. My headphone is working on other device. When I connect the dongle to my phone, there is a notification of charging connected device via usb. On tapping for more options I tried to change the usb control to 'this device' but it says that it cannot switch
All options under 'use usb for' are frozen. I tried to switch on usb debugging in developers option but nothing worked.
I updated my phone to the latest version of android p
(security patch level july 2019) and have restarted my
phone multiple times but nothing is working. My phone is charging normally. Please
help asap.
